Class UserPreferences

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents a single user preference stored in the database. Implements INotifyPropertyChanged to support two-way data binding in UI layers.

[Table("UserPreferences")]
public class UserPreferences : INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
object

Implements

object.ToString()

Remarks

All values are persisted as strings. Use typed accessors (BoolValue, IntValue, DoubleValue) for convenient and type-safe access from business logic or view-models. LastModified is maintained automatically for cache invalidation and audit purposes.

Constructors

UserPreferences()

Initializes a new instance of the UserPreferences class. Sets LastModified to current UTC time.

Key

Unique preference identifier (case-sensitive).

[Required]
[MaxLength(255)]
public string Key { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Remarks

Should be indexed with uniqueness constraint in DbContext configuration. Recommended format: "Category.SubCategory.KeyName"

LastModified

UTC timestamp of the last modification. Used for cache invalidation and optimistic concurrency detection.
